snippet: After a month of conflicting statements and partisan criticism, the circumstances surrounding the deadly attack in Benghazi have become clouded in ambiguities and questions.
abstract: Memo from the Middle East; circumstances surrounding deadly attack on American consulate in Benghazi, Libya, have become clouded in ambiguities and questions after month of conflicting statements and partisan criticism; some analysts suggest confusion might be due to Obama administration attempting to downplay role of Al Qaeda's regional arm due to upcoming presidential election.

byline.contributor: Suliman Ali Zway contributed reporting from Benghazi, Libya.

lead_paragraph: After a month of conflicting statements and partisan criticism, the circumstances surrounding the deadly attack in Benghazi have become clouded in ambiguities and questions.

headline.seo: Election-Year Stakes Overshadow Nuances of Benghazi Investigation
headline.main: Election-Year Stakes Overshadow Nuances of Libya Investigation
headline.print_headline: Election-Year Stakes Overshadow Nuances of Libya Investigation

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb
